sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs"> <x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <definition>Contractor logistics support (CLS) includes the burdened cost of contract labor, material, and assets used in providing support to an electronic system, subsystem, and associated support equipment. CLS funding covers depot maintenance and, as negotiated with the operating command, necessary organizational and intermediate maintenance activities. If CLS is selected as the primary means of support, all functional areas included in the CLS cost should be identified in the cost element documentation.</definition> <number>GWBS0001432</number> <parent_task display_value="4.5 Contractor Services (Post Production ILS)">a7158176db91a3008e9357935e9619a3</parent_task> <sys_class_name>x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>jnyika</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 15:59:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>23158176db91a3008e9357935e9619a4</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jnyika</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 16:53:02</sys_updated_on> <task_code>4.5.2</task_code> <task_name>4.5.2 Contractor Logistics Support</task_name> <task_title>Contractor Logistics Support</task_title> </x_snc_nnemc0_gwbs> </record_update>
